subject: Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The partnership between Chip Woolley and Mark Allen, the trainer and co-owner of Mine That Bird, began in a bar in New Mexico, and is on its way to the Preakness.
snippet: The partnership between Chip Woolley and Mark Allen, the trainer and co-owner of Mine That Bird, began in a bar in New Mexico, and is on its way to the Preakness.
